title: Bookmarkify
description: Bookmarkify is a clean and intuitive web application that helps you collect and manage your online bookmarks. You can save any webpage with one click, organize your links into easy-to-browse collections, and share your favorite bookmark lists with others.

title: Draw a Santa Hat
description: PixWallet is a pixel-art-inspired Solana wallet built with Tauri, designed to provide a lightweight and secure experience. It supports both macOS and Windows, allowing users to manage their SOL assets seamlessly across desktop platforms.

title: Obsidian Bases Lock
description: A small Obsidian plugin to hide the Obsidian Bases toolbar and lock header interaction on demand.

title: PixWallet
description: PixWallet is a pixel-art-inspired Solana wallet built with Tauri, designed to provide a lightweight and secure experience. It supports both macOS and Windows, allowing users to manage their SOL assets seamlessly across desktop platforms.

title: Obsidian Image Cluster
description: Obsidian Image Cluster helps you easily combine multiple images together in your notes, making your note interface more beautiful and organized.

title: PicTidy
description: PicTidy is a simple and efficient desktop tool designed to help you clean and organize your photos.

title: Podcast Shortcuts
description: A small Obsidian plugin to hide the Obsidian Bases toolbar and lock header interaction on demand.

title: NFT DApp
description: Nft交易小站是一个基于Sepolia测试网络的NFT交易平台, 目前托管于Vercel, 交易货币可以在任意Faucet获取.\r\nps:项目大概永远不会并入ETH主网.

title: Omega40 Cases
description: 为满足日常使用场景而设计制作的一款客制化键盘, 代码以及图纸我已经开源, 并且已有商家在量产售卖, 销量1000+

title: BB AFK
description: A Minecraft plugin that detects idle players and rewards them for staying idle in specific locations.

title: Raven Test
description: A fast and minimal app implementing a short-form Raven’s Progressive Matrices test. Provides quick cognitive evaluation within three minutes, optimized for mobile usability and scoring accuracy.
